hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:The Prophet (ﷺ) never took his meals at a dining table, nor in small plates, and he never ate thin wellbaked bread. (The sub-narrator asked Qatada, "Over what did they use to take their meals?" Qatada said, "On leather dining sheets)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا كَانَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَأَصْحَابُهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
chapter.eng-name: What the Prophet (ﷺ) and his Companions used to eat.
